properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 27 at 2:40PM PST until January 31 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 25 to 30 kt this afternoon increasing to 35
to 40 kt this evening and tonight, with very steep wind-driven
seas building to 15 to 17 feet. Winds shift to the southwest and
decrease through Tuesday morning, with seas becoming steep 13
to 15 ft at 15 seconds.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...The Small Craft Advisory is in effect until 4 PM PST
this afternoon, followed by a Gale Warning until 4 AM PST
Tuesday. Another Small Craft Advisory is then in effect from 4
AM Tuesday to 10 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY
